phrases: I did not do it damn it!
I will be held up at school so I cannot go.
First of all, I have to make sense of everything.
Maybe she cannot go to heaven because she is clinging to some worldly regret.
The Menma I know is always...
I have always wanted to apologize to her.
And it goes beyond ordinary contrition.
I know that much for sure.
Maybe that is my wish: to have you go to school.
Why are you going to school?
I should not have to explain.
You do not have to force yourself.
Before this you were yelling at me to go.
but now go forth before you!
There is something you want right?
You can rely on me a bit too you know.
I want to let you go to heaven.
Has Jintan's mom gone to heaven?
I wonder what going to heaven is like.
I am in control of myself.
It is impressive how someone can act like it is no big deal coming to school after that.
Are you talking about that first year from class 3?
Looks like it was true after all.
There are a few people who have noticed me...
Maybe he is that guy who is never showed up before.
She was called to the principal's office?
But I do not think going to a love hotel is such a big deal.
But Anjou's got me beat by a long shot.
Now that it is come to this I feel like I psyched myself up for nothing.
Someone from the PTA saw her.
Apparently she was with some old guy.
You think he was paying her?
You can take a seat too Anjou.
Let us see, the sentiment of this story's narrator
is on several occasions tinged with rage.
First and foremost is his anger at that man and his wife's betrayal.
I am amazed she is taking notes at a time like this.
She is always been that way.
Maybe she will let you do her if you ask.
Second is his anger at himself.
The contents of the letter allude to this fact.
To assert my dominance as both a man and a husband before him...
Maybe she will let you do her.
I am the guy who has not showed up to school in a while.
I have not been to school except for the opening ceremony and the first week of classes.
How do I look to you?
Are not I a sight to see?
I can give her a booty call any time, anywhere.
Are you all really making a big deal out of some love hotel?
Should not it be obvious looking at her that she is been to one a time or two?
She is got that love hotel look to her!
I will only say this once.
She would never take money for sex.
And besides, she is a Capricorn and has blood-type A.
She is never gone out on a limb, she is serious to a fault, and had this pissed off look when she wore glasses.
She is got tons of stuff and she is a neat freak...
She is collected tiny things since she was little.
Let Us get out of here.
I do not have that love hotel look!
I have really never gone to a love hotel.
I have never even been inside one.
What do you mean Yeah, sure?
Do not worry about it, just head home.
Your mom's probably worried about you too.
The school has probably already called my home.
She will be angry at me.
She would never let something like this go.
Hey, what do you mean you are staying over?
It will only be until things calm down.
I will have you know that this place is my castle,
and it is soaked up various manly fluids including but not limited to sweat and tears.
It looks more like a sausage than a ham.
I will start off by cleaning up since that man juice stinks so much.
What are we going to do about her?
Even if she stays over she should tell her mom about it.
Otherwise there will be an uproar.
She always huddled in Menma's shadow.
Then how about we go check out her house?
We might get an idea about her wish that way.
I want you to grant my wish.
Would not it be better if Menma came with us?
Yeah but, would not it be kind of awkward to say
Hey, let us go to Menma's house, when she is right there?
I did not think you were that good at reading people's feelings.
Yeah, well, I did become a level 5 Shaman while I was in Vietnam.
Great, now that that is settled, let us text Yukiatsu.
Let us see, what is his number...
That is how college-prep schools are.
I would thought that no one had changed at all after I saw everyone again.
But that is not the case.
People do change, little by little.
Hey, maybe we should not go to Menma's house after all.
Think about it, we have never even gone to her house to play before.
Yeah, Menma's dad was one scary guy.
But maybe this is a good opportunity.
I mean, I want to light an incense stick for Menma.
I cannot help but think about how Menma's mom will react when she sees us.
I cannot believe everyone came here.
Meiko would be so happy too.
Could you say hello to Meiko?
I have known that all along.
Minako wants you to give this to Matsuyuki.
We are all in the same class.
She should just give it to him herself.
Do not act so high and mighty.
You cannot look down on me just because you are always by his side.
There have been shady people around these parts lately.
People always get envious of you like that.
I am sure I would be freed of all my worries the instant I sent out photos of you cross-dressing.
Oh yeah, apparently Yadomi and the others are going to Menma's house.
Wow, so they are all taking what Yadomi said seriously.
Nobody can leave the past behind them.
I could not get anything past you if I tried anyway.
Be it the school I go to, or my overall standing,
right now I am far above him in every way.
But I am still getting caught up in his pace like back then.
How long does he plan to make a fool out of everyone?
If only he had not told everyone to gather at the secret fort.
Did not Menma call us that day?
That is right, Menma gave me a call.
She wanted to talk about something that day.
Yeah, she said she had something she wanted to talk about, so...
I did not think she would hand over Menma's diary that easily.
My husband told me I could not stay obsessed with Meiko forever, so he cleaned up this room.
Seeing her things will only make it harder for them.
I do not really know how a mother feels,
but I think having a child must be an extremely heavy burden in a lot of way.
You can say that with a straight face?
It is not like I am worried about my parents or anything.
I just remembered something I had to do.
She is not being honest with herself.
But anyway, we got the diary so let us head back to the secret fort and read it.
I am in charge of cooking dinner tonight,
and I have not washed the plates from this morning, so...
Then I will go ahead and...
No, do not read it without me.
Seeing will only make it harder.
Then would it have been better not to have seen Menma?
So you know, I sort of went with the flow and went to see your mom today...
Did you do something like that?
If you do that my mom will remember me.
through lots and lots of sadness.
I do not want to make her any more sad.
I do not want to make her remember me anymore.
You may not want her to remember you, but that is impossible.
I do not care that it is impossible!
Even if it is only a little bit,
I want my mom to forget about me.
You said yourself that you would be happy if we all remembered you.
You are always worrying about others like that.
Think about yourself a little more!
You laugh it off even when you are hurt.
When you cry it is only for other people.
Why am I yelling like this?
And then lie down facing up!
That way it will get better.
I am going out for a bit.
What the hell am I doing?
What are you doing here so late?
And what about the way you are dressed?
It is not what you think!
I had some blood backed up in my nose already.
I swear it is not because you were turning me on...
The ghost of a mother-in-law tortured to death by her inhuman family strikes back!
The ghost of a mother-in-law tortured to death by her inhuman family strikes back!
I did not do it damn it!
I will be held up at school so I cannot go.
We still do not know the name of the flower we saw that day.
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
Upon pages and pages of entries
We have put down all our emotions
But now I have hit a writer's block
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
Putting a bookmark in my diary
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
Let us go to our secret place
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
With cider in my right hand
My other hand helps me search for you
You used to come find me way back when
You used to demand me of so much more
You are both still standing right by my side
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
There must be something off with me
Upon pages and pages of entries
We have put down all our emotions
But now I have hit a writer's block
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
Putting a bookmark in my diary
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
Let us go to our secret place
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
With cider in my right hand
My other hand helps me search for you
You used to come find me way back when
You used to demand me of so much more
You are both still standing right by my side
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
There must be something off with me
kaerimichi no kousaten de koe wo kaketekureta ne
aa hanabi ga yozora kirei ni saite chotto setsunaku
aa kaze ga jikan to tomo ni nagareru
ureshikute tanoshikute bouken mo iro iro shita ne
futari no himitsu no kichi no naka
kimi to natsu no owari shourai no yume ookina kibou wasurenai
jyuunen no ato hachigatsu mata deaeru no wo shinjite
kimi ga saigo made kokoro kara arigatou sakendeita koto shitetayo
The fireworks blossomed heartrendingly beautiful across the night sky,
and time passed as swiftly as the wind.
We met in an unexpected moment
when you called out to me at the crosswalk,
We shared so many happy times and thrilling adventures
I will never forget the hopes and dreams we shared during that one summer's end.
I am sure we will meet again in another August, in maybe ten years time.
I could feel your heartfelt thanks all the way until the end.
And I know it must have been painful
to hold back your tears and say goodbye with a smile.
But those are my best memories.
